summary: net: sched: sch: Fix off by one in htb_activate_prios()
details:
net: sched: sch: Fix off by one in htb_activate_prios()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.13 by commit 4419cb8e5b0f19d8c6730616d9dd493b53c4442a, it was introduced in version v6.1.13 by commit f6415c9c9a0b3881543d38528a58b54af4351522. For more details please see the references link.
